::Bloodystrike::

Bloodystrike watches the five meter opening form and flies forward 
through it, looking around.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Ralph Ares" <ralph@i...> wrote:
> The weapons are then enclosed by the field and held in place, to 
make sure
> they aren't picked up again when the opening forms. Afterwards, 
just as was
> said, a five meter by five meter opening appears as an open 
invitation to
> enter.
